data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Grouville unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Grouville, Jersey
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Grouville, Jersey to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Grouville, Jersey a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Grouville access to a Bible in their own language.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Grouville that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Grouville, Jersey need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Father, help 9 new simple churches start among the 4,900 people in the state of Grouville, Jersey. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
